TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ILongRunningWebApi

Docs.summary: Methods for long-running or background processes in web APIs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Identity.Client.AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder AcquireTokenInLongRunningProcess(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> scopes, string longRunningProcessSessionKey) cil managed
Public Function AcquireTokenInLongRunningProcess (scopes As IEnumerable(Of String), longRunningProcessSessionKey As String) As AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder

Docs.param: Scopes requested to access a protected API.
Key by which to look up the token in the cache.
Docs.summary: Retrieves an access token from the cache using the provided cache key that can be used to access another downstream protected web API on behalf of a user using the OAuth 2.0 On-Behalf-Of flow. See Long-running OBO in MSAL.NET. Use to stop the long running process and remove the associated tokens from the cache.
Docs.returns: A builder enabling you to add other parameters before executing the token request.
Docs.remarks: This method should be called during the long-running session to retrieve the token from the cache.
Docs.exception: The token cache does not contain a token with an OBO cache key that matches the .

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Identity.Client.AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder InitiateLongRunningProcessInWebApi (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> scopes, string userToken, ref string longRunningProcessSessionKey);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Identity.Client.AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder InitiateLongRunningProcessInWebApi(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> scopes, string userToken, string& longRunningProcessSessionKey) cil managed
Public Function InitiateLongRunningProcessInWebApi (scopes As IEnumerable(Of String), userToken As String, ByRef longRunningProcessSessionKey As String) As AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder
abstract member InitiateLongRunningProcessInWebApi : seq<string> * string * string -> Microsoft.Identity.Client.AcquireTokenOnBehalfOfParameterBuilder

Docs.param: Scopes requested to access a protected API.
A JSON Web Token which was used to call this web API and contains the credential information about the user on behalf of whom to get a token.
Key by which to look up the token in the cache. If null, it will be set to the assertion hash of the userToken by default.
Docs.summary: Acquires an access token for this web API from the authority configured in the application, in order to access another downstream protected web API on behalf of a user using the OAuth 2.0 On-Behalf-Of flow. See Long-running OBO in MSAL.NET. Pass an access token (not an ID token) which was used to call this confidential client application in the userToken parameter. Use to stop the long running process and remove the associated tokens from the cache.
Docs.returns: A builder enabling you to add other parameters before executing the token request.
Docs.remarks: This method should be called once when the long-running session is started.
